com.facebook.buck.ide.intellij.aggregation

Class AggregationTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.ide.intellij.aggregation.AggregationTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphTraversable<com.facebook.buck.ide.intellij.aggregation.AggregationTreeNode>

    public class AggregationTree
extends Object
implements GraphTraversable<com.facebook.buck.ide.intellij.aggregation.AggregationTreeNode>
    A tree that is responsible for managing and aggregating modules.

    The tree accepts an arbitrary number of modules each of which is located at a specific location.

    The tree can aggregate the modules by merging modules with the same aggregation tag into one module. The aggregation happens at some specific level.

    This data structure is based on a prefix tree.
